entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as a member of the dream team that needs to be split up. He is paired with Finnigan.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as a member of the dream team that needs to be split up. He is paired with Malfoy.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as moving automatically towards Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being paired with Miss Bulstrode.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as smiling coldly and pairing Malfoy with Potter.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as strutting over to face Harry.

entities.name: miss bulstrode
entities.description: Miss Bulstrode is mentioned as being paired with Hermione.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is mentioned as calling out to face partners and bow.

entities.name: finnigan
entities.description: Finnigan is mentioned as being paired with Weasley.

entities.name: hags
entities.description: Hags are mentioned in a picture that Harry has seen in Holidays with Hags.

relationships.description: Hermione is partnered with Miss Bulstrode.
Potter and Malfoy are opponents in a charm-disarming duel.
Harry Potter moved automatically towards Hermione.
